mapper.select: SELECT driveID, DATE_FORMAT(drvdate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS 'drvdate', drvclub, chk2, lastkm, useamt, useOil, drvrem, rependchk, IF(rependdate IS NULL, '',rependdate) AS 'rependdate', repaddkm FROM tdrive WHERE carno = #{userID} AND drvdate LIKE CONCAT(#{date}, '%') ORDER BY drvdate DESC

SELECT driveID, DATE_FORMAT(drvdate, '%m.%d') AS 'drvdate', drvclub, chk2, lastkm, useamt, useOil, drvrem, rependchk, IF(rependdate IS NULL, '',rependdate) AS 'rependdate', repaddkm FROM tdrive WHERE carno = #{userID} ORDER BY driveId DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT driveID, DATE_FORMAT(drvdate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS 'drvdate', drvclub, chk2, lastkm, useamt, useOil, drvrem, IF(rependdate IS NULL OR rependdate = '0000-00-00', '', DATE_FORMAT(rependdate, '%Y-%m-%d')) AS 'rependdate', repaddkm, rependchk FROM tdrive WHERE carno = #{userID} AND driveID = #{driveID}
